column6: THIS IS IT! THE MOMENT YOU'VE BEEN WAITING FOR! Make sure to pick up this issue for the DEBUT of a very special guest. Also, special appearances by some of your favorite Marvel Universe heroes (and even some villains). But what will the Paradise and Wolverines team think of the return?
column8: | writer:Ray Fawkes | writer:Charles Soule | penciller (cover):Guillem March | artist:Jason Masters
